functions.description: Returns the AASHTO classification of the soil.
functions.name: AASHTO

parameters.description: Liquid limit of the soil (%). liquid_limit >= 0 and liquid_limit > plastic_limit
parameters.name: liquid_limit

parameters.description: Plastic limit of the soil (%). plastic_limit >= 0.
parameters.name: plastic_limit

parameters.description: Percentage of fines in the soil. fines >= 0.
parameters.name: fines

parameters.description:
Indicates whether only the group index should be returned. It takes precedence
over add_group_idx and description. If omitted, only_group_idx = false.
parameters.name: only_group_idx

parameters.description:
Indicates whether the group index should be added to the
 classification.  If omitted, add_group_idx = true.
parameters.name: add_group_idx

parameters.description:
Indicates whether to return the description of the
classification. If omitted, description = false. NB: If only_group_idx=true,then
description won't be returned, intead the group index will be returned.
parameters.name: description

functions.description: Returns the USCS classification of the soil.
functions.name: USCS

parameters.description: Liquid limit of the soil (%). liquid_limit >= 0 and liquid_limit > plastic_limit
parameters.name: liquid_limit

parameters.description: Plastic limit of the soil (%). plastic_limit >= 0.
parameters.name: plastic_limit

parameters.description: Percentage of fines in the soil. fines >= 0.
parameters.name: fines

parameters.description: Percentage of sand in the soil. sand >= 0.
parameters.name: sand

parameters.description: Diameter at which 10% of soil is finer.
parameters.name: d_10

parameters.description: Diameter at which 30% of soil is finer.
parameters.name: d_30

parameters.description: Diameter at which 60% of soil is finer.
parameters.name: d_60

parameters.description:
Indicates whether the soil is organic. If omitted,
organic = false.
parameters.name: organic

parameters.description:
Indicates whether to return the description of the
classification. If omitted, description = false.
parameters.name: description

functions.description: Returns the ultimate bearing capacity of the soil for shallow foundations (kN/m^2 or kPa).
functions.name: ULTIMATE_BEARING_CAPACITY

parameters.description:
Internal angle of friction for general shear failure (degrees).
friction_angle >= 0.
parameters.name: friction_angle

parameters.description: Cohesion of the soil (kN/m^2). cohesion >= 0.
parameters.name: cohesion

parameters.description: Unit weight of the soil (kN/m^3). moist_unit_wgt > 0.
parameters.name: moist_unit_wgt

parameters.description: Depth of the foundation (m).
parameters.name: depth

parameters.description: Width of the foundation footing (m). width > 0.0
parameters.name: width

parameters.description: Length of the foundation footing (m). length > 0.0
parameters.name: length

parameters.description: Factor of safety. If omitted factor_of_safety = 3.
parameters.name: factor_of_safety

parameters.description: Saturated unit weight of soil (kN/m^3). If omitted, saturated_unit_wgt = 20.5,
parameters.name: saturated_unit_wgt

parameters.description: Depth of the ground water level (m). ground_water_level >= 0.
parameters.name: ground_water_level

parameters.description:
Eccentricity of applied load (m). eccentricity >= 0, If omitted,
eccentricity = 0.0.
parameters.name: eccentricity

parameters.description:
Inclination of applied load with the vertical (degrees). If omitted,
load_angle = 0.0.
parameters.name: load_angle

parameters.description:
Indicates whether to apply local shear. If omitted,
apply_local_shear = false.
parameters.name: apply_local_shear

parameters.description:
Shape of the foundation footing. If omitted, shape = "square".
Available options are "square", "rectangle", "circle", and "strip".
parameters.name: shape

parameters.description:
Type of bearing capacity calculation. If omitted, ubc_type = "vesic".
Available options are "terzaghi", and "vesic".
parameters.name: ubc_type

parameters.description: Indicates whether to return the allowable bearing capacity of the soil or not.
parameters.name: allowable_bearing_capacity

functions.description: Returns the allowable bearing capacity of the soil for shallow foundations (kN/m^2 or kPa).
functions.name: ALLOWABLE_BEARING_CAPACITY

parameters.description:
Corrected SPT N values. Valid values for
each corrected_spt_n_value should be between
(0 < corrected_spt_n_value <= 100)
parameters.name: corrected_spt_n_value

parameters.description: Tolerable settlement of foundation (mm). (0 <= tol_settlement <= 25.4)
parameters.name: tol_settlement

parameters.description: Depth of the foundation (m). depth > 0.0
parameters.name: depth

parameters.description: Width of the foundation footing (m). width > 0.0
parameters.name: width

parameters.description: Length of the foundation footing (m). length > 0.
parameters.name: length

parameters.description:
Eccentricity of applied load (m). eccentricity >= 0. If omitted,
eccentricity = 0.0.
parameters.name: eccentricity

parameters.description: Depth of the ground water level (m). ground_water_level >= 0.0
parameters.name: ground_water_level

parameters.description:
Shape of the foundation footing.  If omitted, shape = "square".
Available options are "square", "rectangle", "circle", and "strip".
parameters.name: shape

parameters.description:
Type of foundation. If omitted, foundation_type = "pad".
Available options are "pad" and "mat".
parameters.name: foundation_type

parameters.description:
Type of bearing capacity calculation. If omitted, abc_type = "bowles".
Available options are "bowles", "meyerhof", and "terzaghi".
parameters.name: abc_type

functions.description: SPT N deisgn calculation using weighted average.
functions.name: SPT_N_DESIGN

parameters.description:
Corrected SPT N values. Valid value for each corrected_spt_n_value
should be between (0 < corrected_spt_n_value <= 100)
parameters.name: corrected_spt_n_values

functions.description: Returns the SPT N-value corrected for field procedures.
functions.name: SPT_ENERGY_CORRECTION

parameters.description:
Recorded SPT N value. Valid values are between
(0 < recorded_spt_n_value <= 100)
parameters.name: recorded_spt_n_value

parameters.description:
Percentage of energy reaching the tip of the sampler. Valid values
are between (0.0 < energy_percentage <= 1.0). If omitted,
energy_percentage = 0.6.
parameters.name: energy_percentage

parameters.description:
Borehole diameter (mm). Valid values are between
(65.0 <= borehole_diameter <= 200.0) If omitted, borehole_diameter = 65.0.
parameters.name: borehole_diameter

parameters.description:
Length of spt rod (m). Valid values are (rod_length > 0.0). If omitted,
rod_length = 3.0.
parameters.name: rod_length

parameters.description:
Hammer type. If omitted, hammer_type = "donut_1".
Available options are "automatic", "donut_1", "donut_2", "safety",
"drop" and "pin"
parameters.name: hammer_type

parameters.description:
Sampler type. If omitted, sampler_type = "standard".
Available options are "standard" and "non_standard".
parameters.name: sampler_type

functions.description: Returns the SPT N-value corrected for overburden pressure.
functions.name: SPT_OVERBURDEN_PRESSURE_CORRECTION

parameters.description:
Standardized SPT N value. Valid values are between
(0.0 < std_spt_n_value <= 100.0)
parameters.name: std_spt_n_value

parameters.description: Effective overburden pressure (kN/m^2).
parameters.name: eop

parameters.description:
Overburden pressure correction type. If omitted, opc_type = "gibbs".
Available options are "gibbs", "bazaraa", "peck", "liao", and "skempton".
parameters.name: opc_type

functions.description: Returns the SPT N-value corrected for dilatancy.
functions.name: SPT_DILATANCY_CORRECTION

parameters.description:
Corrected SPT N value. Valid values are between
(0.0 < corrected_spt_n_value <= 100.0)
parameters.name: corrected_spt_n_value
